00014 
00015 void
00016 init_dist()
00017 {
00018         FILE    *fp;
00019         char    *temp;
00020 
00021         fp = fopen(".ross_network", "r");
00022 
00023         if(!fp)
00024         {
00025                 DIST = 0;
00026                 return;
00027         }
00028 
00029         temp = calloc(255, 1);
00030 
00031         while(EOF != (fscanf(fp, "%s\n", temp)))
00032                 DIST++;
00033 }
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * This mapping simply maps the network nodes in the order they appear
00037  * in the XML file.  This mapping does not take into account the network
00038  * link topology to reduce remote messages in the simulator.
00039  */
00040 void
00041 map_linear()
00042 {
00043         int      i;
00044         int      npe;
00045 
00046         tw_lp   *lp;
00047         tw_kp   *kp;
00048         tw_pe   *pe;
00049 
00050         printf("Mapping network topology in linear mode. \n");
00051 
00052         npe = ROSS_NPE;
00053         npe = g_tw_npe;
00054 
00055         for (i = 0; i < g_tw_nlp; i++)
00056         {
00057                 lp = tw_getlp(i);
00058                 kp = tw_getkp(i % npe);
00059                 pe = tw_getpe(i % npe);
00060 
00061                 tw_lp_settype(lp, 1);
00062 
00063                 tw_lp_onkp(lp, kp);
00064                 tw_lp_onpe(lp, pe);
00065                 tw_kp_onpe(kp, pe);
00066         }
00067 
00068         if(DIST < 0xff)
00069         {
00070                 init_dist();
00071 
00072                 for(i = 0; DIST && i < g_tw_npe; i++)
00073                 {
00074                         tw_pe_onnode(tw_getpe(i), i % DIST);
00075                         //printf("PE %d on node %d \n", i, (i % DIST));
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 }
